subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: In a men’s game in Cincinnati, Remy Abell scored a career-high 21 points, and No. 6 Xavier recovered from its first loss of the season by beating No. 9 Butler, 88-69.
snippet: In a men’s game in Cincinnati, Remy Abell scored a career-high 21 points, and No. 6 Xavier recovered from its first loss of the season by beating No. 9 Butler, 88-69.
